text: isee prakaar bahut-se bahudevavaadiyon ke lie unake lie saajheedaaron ne unakee apanee santaan kee hatya ko suhaana bana diya hai, taaki unhen vinasht kar den aur unake lie unake dharm ko sandigdh bana den. yadi allaah chaahata to ve aisa na karate; to chhod do unhen aur unake jhooth ghadane ko
